mainText:
I wrote my first lines of code on an Apple IIe when I was barely in
elementary school. That experience shaped my life immeasurably. Learning how
to code at such a young age taught me how to think and solve complex
problems. It led to my first job, working as a software developer when I was
seventeen. Steve's example  made me want to start my own company, which I
have, and his exquisite taste has an impact of virtually every decision I
make. He will be missed.
author: Eric
